lines: 1. Lisheni indibu kulyu buseko, Pa muntu wafuma ku bubi;
Wishi alemukumanya mu nshila, Amusengela walubile.
Lulu-mbi baimba bangeli, Lulu-mbi lisheni amasese:
Abalubulwa baleimbo lwimbo, Baleimba lwa kulubulwa
2. Lisheni indibu kuli buseko, Walubile nomba nabwela;
Apusushiwa kufuma ku bubi, Wene afyalwa cipya cipya.
3. Lisheni Indibu ku mutebeto, Bangeli baleimbo bwansho;
Twaleni ilyashi liye kutali, Watemwikwa nafyalwa lelo.
